page.title: 15EDUCATION, BOX SCHOOL.
page.content:
{
The school is one hundred and ninety years old being built in 1876. There are four teachers and about eighty five pupils. They haven't had any vandalism,but in 1984 their swimming pool was damaged. They haven't got a hall but they use{Selwyn {Hall}for P.E. and they use the big classrooms to have dinner in.They have got four classrooms in the school.The children's ages vary from five to eleven.Not all of the pupils come from{Box}village but they all come from the same parish.Their playtimes are fifteen minutes in the morning and fifteen minutes in the afternoon.They play games like football,netball,cricket and rounders. They work at{Maths,English,Art,Topic, {Music,Craft,Games and Swimming.
